mozilla.components.support.base.observer

Interface Observable<T>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ObserverRegistry

    public Observable<T>

    Interface for observables. This interface is implemented by ObserverRegistry so that classes that want to be observable can implement the interface by delegation:

        class MyObservableClass : Observable by registry {
      ...
    }

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods

      <R> java.util.List<kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1> wrapConsumers(kotlin.jvm.functions.Function2<? super T,? super R,java.lang.Boolean> block)
      Returns a list of lambdas wrapping a consuming method of an observer.

    • Method Detail

      • register

        void register(T observer)

        Registers an observer to get notified about changes.

      • register

        void register(T observer,
              android.arch.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner owner)

        Registers an observer to get notified about changes.

        The observer will automatically unsubscribe if the lifecycle of the provided LifecycleOwner becomes DESTROYED.

      • register

        void register(T observer,
              android.view.View view)

        Registers an observer to get notified about changes.

        The observer will automatically unsubscribe if the provided view gets detached.

      • unregister

        void unregister(T observer)

        Unregisters an observer.

      • unregisterObservers

        void unregisterObservers()

        Unregisters all observers.

      • notifyObservers

        void notifyObservers(kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1<? super T,kotlin.Unit> block)

        Notify all registered observers about a change.

      • wrapConsumers

        <R> java.util.List<kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1> wrapConsumers(kotlin.jvm.functions.Function2<? super T,? super R,java.lang.Boolean> block)

        Returns a list of lambdas wrapping a consuming method of an observer.
